name: Mobo Studio
overview:
Mobo Studio highly specialized and experienced development studio which can help you with any mobile/tablet development and design. We always provide high quality graphics design and user experience to our clients: http://www.mobostudio.com

We are not just developers, we can also help you invent and design your project. We follow mobile market for many years. We can also help you publish your apps/games.

If you are interested in any of following platforms development:

  • iPhone/iPad
  • Android
  • Blackberry
  • Samsung BADA
  • J2ME

Just contact us: contact@mobostudio.com

Here is some of technologies/frameworks/api that we used (really used not just willing to use) in mobile applications: Google Maps Kit, Motion sensor, Location services, OpenGL, OpenAL audio processing, Cocos2d games framework, Chipmunk physics engine, Internet Audio streaming, CC payment integration, Brightcove SDK integration, Andengine games framework, J2ME Polish framework, In-app purchase, Subsciptions - cheddargetter, Bluetooth communication - games, REST communication, Asymetric keys signing, encoded SMS listening and interpretation , SQL lite, ORM lite, Openstreet Maps, Openfeint, …
